meta.description: Robust and stochastic geometric consensus algorithms

robust_geometric_consensus.advantage: Robust to outliers compared to Fréchet Mean (L2)

stochastic_geometric_algorithms.application: Large-scale consensus where full gradient is expensive

mathematical_foundations.geometric_median_properties: Unique minimizer for strictly convex distance functions on Hadamard manifolds
mathematical_foundations.rsgd_convergence: Converges to critical point for non-convex objectives, global min for geodesically convex

convergence_failure.logic: If ||x_{k+1} - x_k|| > threshold after N iterations, flag 'Divergence'
convergence_failure.action: Reset to best known state or increase damping

manifold_constraint_violation.logic: If updated point leaves manifold chart

detailed_mechanisms.weiszfeld_step: Iterative reweighted least squares on tangent space
detailed_mechanisms.parallel_transport_implementation: Schild's ladder or pole ladder for vector transport
